Sun.1: Strong leadership qualities, natural authority, recognition in career. You have the charisma to lead and inspire others.
Sun.2: Wealth through career, financial stability, good earning capacity. Your profession brings material prosperity.
Sun.3: Courage, communication skills, success through writing or media. Career in communications, journalism, or creative writing.
Sun.4: Career in real estate, agriculture, or property-related fields. Success through land, property, or mother-related businesses.
Sun.5: Creative career, teaching, speculation, or entertainment industry. Success through creativity, education, or investments.
Sun.6: Success over competitors, career in service, healthcare, or law. You excel in competitive environments and service-oriented professions.
Sun.7: Partnerships in business, career through spouse or partners. Success through collaborations and business partnerships.
Sun.8: Hidden sources of income, career in research or occult sciences. Unconventional career paths, research, or transformation.
Sun.9: Career aligned with dharma, teaching, philosophy, or long-distance travel. Success through higher knowledge and spiritual pursuits.
Sun.10: Excellent career prospects, high position, recognition, authority. You achieve great success and recognition in your profession.
Sun.11: Gains through career, networking, friends help in profession. Success through social connections and networking.
Sun.12: Career abroad, foreign connections, or career in spiritual fields. Success through international work or spiritual pursuits.
